relevant_findings.pigmented_nevi: Multiple, small-to-large, dark brown to black nevi involving approximately 70% of body surface area, predominantly over the scalp, neck, back, and buttocks.
relevant_findings.scalp_nodules: Two firm, 1 cm blue-black nodules over the anterior fontanel.
relevant_findings.facial_asymmetry: Facial and scalp asymmetry with diffuse right-sided enlargement.
relevant_findings.ophthalmologic_findings: Multiple eyelid margin acrochordons, a medial perilimbal conjunctival nodule, and a lateral corneal-scleral dermoid.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No evidence of metastatic malignant melanoma was present at the 17-month follow-up.
